name: Card Puzzle (BrainVM Games)
description:
Card Puzzle is an original card game. The goal of this game is very simple: drag the card onto the board to make 13 or make a pair.

Play Card Puzzle on your spare time, it makes time go by fast!
*****
Different awesome backgrounds for customization
6 beautiful card faces to choose from!
Auto-saved mode, Easy-to-play game!
Fun for all ages!
Awesome graphics, modern and beautiful design!

Have fun!

Install instructions

1 - Download the zip file 

2 - Unpack the zip file 

3 - Launch "cardpuzzle.exe"
